name: Patagonia Black Hole Pack 25L - Unisex
description:
A roomy daypack with a thick skin that can take the bumps and scrapes of travel or your daily grind. A large main compartment holds your travel capsule wardrobe or carry-on gear, and an internal laptop sleeve cushions its contents. Plenty of pockets on the inside prevent unnecessary rummaging. Padded shoulder straps and a moulded back panel make for comfortable carrying on long travel days, and daisy chain lash points mean you can bring a yoga mat or ukulele along for the ride. An external pocket lets you quickly stash a last-minute item you remember on your way out the door.Fabric is durable 300-denier recycled polyester ripstop (22% solution dyed) with a TPU film laminate and a DWR finish for water resistance.Padded shoulder straps with a sternum strap for comfortable carrying.Moulded back panel sheds moisture and promotes airflow.Zippered bucket-style top opening gives you access to the main compartment.Internal padded sleeve holds laptops up to 15in.Zippered external pocket and lots of internal pockets keep you organized.Compatible with a hydration reservoir (not included).Side stretch pockets carry water bottles.

        Sustainability
